title: Enhancing Self-Regulation Strategies in Online Assessment: Utilizing Peer Feedback and AI Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based assessments in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment, targeting professional learners requiring scientific academic writing competency enhancement

learning_goals: Learners can identify and develop a revision plan for at least three areas of improvement in their academic writing through peer feedback
Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies (e.g., time management, goal setting) using AI chatbots with over 80% accuracy
Learners can enhance learning efficiency by over 20% by combining peer feedback and AI support during online project evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
